title: Describing an Association: Linear vs. Non-Linear
question_text: Looking at the scatterplot, which of the following describes the nature of the association?

choices.text:
There is a strong negative linear association between x
and y
.

There is a strong positive linear association between x
and y
.

There is a strong negative non-linear association between x
and y
.

There is a strong positive non-linear association between
x
and
y
.

There is a weak positive non-linear association between
x
and
y
.
